headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BERNSTEIN, HELEN LIPMAN

lead_paragraph: BERNSTEIN--Helen Lipman. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Helen Lipman Bernstein, beloved wife of the late Harold Bernstein. Her exceptional philanthropic traditions live on through the generosity of her cherished family. We extend our condolences to Helen's entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO
